analyzed: an aśitvā muhūrtam sabhāyām āsitvā api kāmam tat eva
tasya upasthānam atha yatra eva bhasma uddhṛtam upanigacet tat eva tasya upasthānam evam u
ha asya etāḥ devatāḥ upasthitāḥ bhavanti
yajamāna devatyaḥ vai gārhapatyaḥ
atha eṣa bhrātṛvya devatyaḥ

original: yadanvāhāryapacanastasmādetaṃ nāharaharāhareyurna ha vā asya sapatnā bhavanti
analyzed: yat anvāhāryapacanaḥ tasmāt etam na ahar ahar āhareyuḥ na ha vai asya sapatnāḥ bhavanti

original: yasyaivaṃ viduṣa etaṃ nāharaharāharantyanvāhāryapacano vā eṣaḥ 2.3.2.[7]
analyzed: yasya evam viduṣaḥ etam na ahar ahar āharanti anvāhāryapacanaḥ vai eṣaḥ
upavasathe eva enam āhareyuḥ
yatra eva asmin yakṣyantaḥ bhavanti tathā u ha asya eṣaḥ
moghāya āhṛtaḥ bhavati
nava avasite vā enam āhareyuḥ
tasmin paceyuḥ tat brāhmaṇāḥ aśnīyuḥ yadi u tat na
vindet yat pacet api goḥ eva dugdham adhiśrayitavai brūyāt tasmin brāhmaṇān pāyayitavai

original: brūyātpāpīyāṃso ha vā asya sapatnā bhavanti yasyaivaṃ viduṣa evaṃ kurvanti
analyzed: brūyāt pāpīyāṃsaḥ ha vai asya sapatnāḥ bhavanti yasya evam viduṣaḥ evam kurvanti
tasmāt evam eva cikīrṣet
tat yatra etat prathamam samiddhaḥ bhavati

original: dhūpyata iva tarhi haiṣa bhavati rudraḥ sa
analyzed: dhūpyate iva tarhi ha eṣa bhavati rudraḥ sa

original: yaḥ kāmayeta yathemā rudraḥ prajā aśraddhayeva tvatsahaseva tvannighātamiva
analyzed: yaḥ kāmayeta yathā imāḥ rudraḥ prajāḥ aśraddhayā iva tvad sahasā iva tvad nighātam iva

original: tvatsacata evamannamadyāmiti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti haivaitadannādyaṃ ya
analyzed: tvat sacate evam annam adyām iti tarhi ha sa juhuyāt prāpnoti ha eva etat annādyam yaḥ
evam vidvān tarhi juhoti
atha yatra etat pradīptataraḥ bhavati

original: tarhi haiṣa bhavati varuṇaḥ sa yaḥ kāmayeta
analyzed: tarhi ha eṣa bhavati varuṇaḥ sa yaḥ kāmayeta

original: yathemā varuṇaḥ prajā gṛhṇanniva tvatsahaseva tvannighātamiva tvatsacata
analyzed: yathā imāḥ varuṇaḥ prajāḥ gṛhṇan iva tvad sahasā iva tvad nighātam iva tvat sacata

original: evamannamadyāmiti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti haivaitadannādyaṃ ya evaṃ
analyzed: evam anna madyām iti tarhi ha sa juhuyāt prāpnoti ha eva etat annādyam yaḥ evam
vidvān tarhi juhoti
atha yatra etat pradīptaḥ bhavati

original: uccairdhūmaḥ paramayā jūtyā balbalīti tarhi haiṣa
analyzed: uccais dhūmaḥ paramayā jūtyā balbalī iti tarhi ha eṣa

original: bhavatīndraḥ sa yaḥ kāmayetendraiva śriyā yaśasā syāmiti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti
analyzed: bhavati indraḥ sa yaḥ kāmayeta indra eva śriyā yaśasā syām iti tarhi ha sa juhuyāt prāpnoti
ha eva etat annādyam yaḥ evam vidvān tarhi juhoti
atha yatra etat pratitarām iva

original: tiraścīvārciḥ saṃśāmyato bhavati tarhi haiṣa bhavati
analyzed: tiraści iva arciḥ saṃśāmyataḥ bhavati tarhi ha eṣa bhavati

original: mitraḥ sa yaḥ kāmayeta maitreṇedamannamadyāmiti yamāhuḥ sarvasya vā ayam
analyzed: mitraḥ sa yaḥ kāmayeta maitreṇa idam annam adyām iti yam āhuḥ sarvasya vai ayam

original: brāhmaṇo mitraṃna vā ayaṃ kaṃ cana hinastīti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ mitram na vai ayam kam cana hinasti iti tarhi ha sa juhuyāt prāpnoti
ha eva etat annādyam yaḥ evam vidvān tarhi juhoti
atha yatra etat aṅgārāḥ cākaśyante iva

original: tarhi haiṣa bhavati brahma sa yaḥ kāmayeta
analyzed: tarhi ha eṣa bhavati brahma sa yaḥ kāmayeta

original: brahmavarcasī syāmiti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti haivaitadannādyaṃ ya evaṃ
analyzed: brahmavarcasī syām iti tarhi ha sa juhuyāt prāpnoti ha eva etat annādyam yaḥ evam
vidvān tarhi juhoti
eteṣām ekam saṃvatsaram upertset
svayam juhvat yadi vā asya anyaḥ juhuyāt atha yaḥ

original: 'nyathānyathā juhoti yathāpo vābhikhanannanyadvānnādyaṃ sa sāmi nivartetaivaṃ
analyzed: nyathā anyathā juhoti yathā apaḥ vā abhikhanan anyat vā annādyam sa sāmi nivarteta evam

original: tadatha yaḥ sārdhaṃ juhoti yathāpo vābhikhanannanyadvānnādyaṃ tatkṣipre
analyzed: tat atha yaḥ sārdham juhoti yathā apaḥ vā abhikhanan anyat vā annādyam tat kṣipre
bhitṛndyāt evam tat

original: abhrayo ha vā etā annādyasya yadāhutayaḥ /
analyzed: abhrayaḥ ha vai etāḥ annādyasya yat āhutayaḥ
abhi ha eva etat annādyam tṛṇatti yaḥ evam
vidvān agnihotram juhoti
sā yā pūrvāhutiḥ

original: te devā atha yottarā te manuṣyā atha yatsruci pariśinaṣṭi te
analyzed: te devāḥ atha yā uttarā te manuṣyāḥ atha yat sruci pariśinaṣṭi te
paśavaḥ

original: sa vai kanīya iva pūrvāmāhutiṃ juhoti /
analyzed: sa vai kanīyaḥ iva pūrvām āhutim juhoti

original: bhūya ivottarām bhūya iva sruci pariśinaṣṭi 2.3.2.[18]
analyzed: bhūyas iva uttarām bhūyas iva sruci pariśinaṣṭi
sa yat kanīyaḥ iva pūrvām āhutim juhoti
kanīyāṃsaḥ hi devāḥ manuṣyebhyaḥ tha

original: yadbhūya ivottarām bhūyāṃso hi manuṣyā devebhyo 'tha yadbhūya iva sruci
analyzed: yat bhūyaḥ iva uttarām bhūyāṃsaḥ hi manuṣyāḥ devebhyaḥ yat bhūyaḥ iva sruci

original: pariśinaṣṭi bhūyāṃso hi paśavo manuṣyebhyaḥ kanīyāṃso ha vā asya bhāryā bhavanti
analyzed: pariśinaṣṭi bhūyāṃsaḥ hi paśavaḥ manuṣyebhyaḥ kanīyāṃsaḥ ha vai asya bhāryāḥ bhavanti

original: bhūyāṃsaḥ paśavo ya evaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti tadvai samṛddhaṃ yasya
analyzed: bhūyāṃsaḥ paśavaḥ yaḥ evam vidvān agnihotram juhoti tat vai samṛddham yasya
kanīyāṃsaḥ bhāryāḥ asan bhūyāṃsaḥ paśavaḥ
yatra vai prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sasṛje

original: sa yatrāgniṃ sasṛje sa idaṃ jātaḥ sarvameva
analyzed: sa yatra agnim sasṛje saḥ idam jātaḥ sarvam eva

original: dagdhuṃ dadhra ityevābilameva tā yāstarhi prajā āsustā hainaṃ sampeṣṭuṃ dadhrire
analyzed: dagdhum dadhre iti eva abilam eva tāḥ yāḥ tarhi prajāḥ āsuḥ tāḥ ha enam sampeṣṭum dadhrire
saḥ titikṣamāṇaḥ puruṣam eva abhyeyāya

original: sa hovāca / na vā ahamidaṃ titikṣe hanta tvā praviśāni tam mā janayitvā bibhṛhi sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca na vai aham idam titikṣe hanta tvā praviśāni tam mā janayitvā bibhṛhi sa

original: yathaiva māṃ tvamasmiṃloke janayitvā bhariṣyasyevamevāhaṃ tvāmamuṣmiṃloke
analyzed: yathā eva mām tvam asmin loke janayitvā bhariṣyasi evam eva aham tvām amuṣmin loke
janayitvā bhariṣyāmi iti tathā iti tam janayitvā abibhar
sa yat agnī ādhatte

original: tadenaṃ janayati taṃ janayitvā bibharti sa yathā haivaiṣa
analyzed: tat enam janayati tam janayitvā bibharti sa yathā ha eva eṣa

original: etamasmiṃloke janayitvā bibhartyevamu haivaiṣa etamamuṣmiṃloke janayitvā
analyzed: etam asmin loke janayitvā bibharti evam u ha eva eṣa etam amuṣmin loke janayitvā
bibharti
tat na sāmi udvāsayeta

original: sāmi hāsmai sa glāyati sa yathā haivaiṣa etasmā asmiṃloke
analyzed: sāmi ha asmai sa glāyati sa yathā ha eva eṣa etasmai asmin loke

original: sāmi glāyatyevamu haivaiṣa etasmā amuṣmiṃloke sāmi glāyati tasmānna
analyzed: sāmi glāyati evam u ha eva eṣa etasmai amuṣmin loke sāmi glāyati tasmāt na
sāmī udvāsayeta
sa yatra mriyate
yatra enam agnau abhyādadhati tat eṣaḥ gneḥ adhijāyate saḥ eṣa putraḥ
san pitā bhavati
tasmāt etat ṛṣiṇā abhyanūktam

original: śataminnu śarado anti devā yatrā naścakrā jarasaṃ
analyzed: śatam id nu śaradaḥ anti devāḥ yatrā naḥ cakrā jarasam

original: tanūnām putrāso yatra pitaro bhavanti mā no madhyā rīriṣatāyurgantoriti putro
analyzed: tanūnām putrāsaḥ yatra pitaraḥ bhavanti mā naḥ madhyā rīriṣata āyuḥ gantoḥ iti

original: hyeṣa santsa punaḥ pitā bhavatyetannu tadyasmādagnī ādadhīta 2.3.3.[7]
analyzed: hi eṣa san sa punar pitā bhavati etat nu tat yasmāt agnī ādadhīta
tat vai eṣaḥ eva mṛtyuḥ

original: sa eṣa tapati tadyadeṣa eva mṛtyustasmādyā etasmādarvācyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa tapati tat yat eṣaḥ eva mṛtyuḥ tasmāt yāḥ etasmāt arvācyaḥ

original: prajāstā mriyante 'tha yāḥ parācyaste devāstasmādu te 'mṛtāstasyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā
analyzed: prajāḥ tāḥ mriyante yāḥ parācyaḥ te devāḥ tasmāt u te mṛtāḥ tasya imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā
raśmibhiḥ prāṇeṣu abhihitāḥ tasmāt u raśmayaḥ prāṇān abhyavatāyante
sa yasya kāmayate

original: tasya prāṇamādāyodeti sa mriyate sa yo haitam
analyzed: tasya prāṇam ādāya udeti sa mriyate sa yaḥ ha etam

original: mṛtyumanatimucyāthāmuṃ lokameti yathā haivāsmiṃloke na saṃyatamādriyate yadā
analyzed: mṛtyum an atimucya atha amum lokam eti yathā ha eva asmin loke na saṃyatam ādriyate yadā
yadā eva kāmayate mārayati evam u ha eva amuṣmin loke punar punar eva
pramārayati
sa yat sāyam astamite dve āhutī juhoti
tat etābhyām pūrvābhyām

original: padbhyāmetasminmṛtyau pratitiṣṭhatyatha yatprātaranudite dve āhutī juhoti
analyzed: padbhyām etasmin mṛtyau pratitiṣṭhati atha yat prātar an udite dve āhutī juhoti
tat etābhyām aparābhyām padbhyām etasmin mṛtyau pratitiṣṭhita saḥ enam eṣa

original: udyannevādāyodeti tadetam mṛtyumatimucyate saiṣāgnihotre mṛtyoratimuktirati ha
analyzed: udyan eva ādāya udeti tat etam mṛtyum atimucyate sā eṣā agnihotre mṛtyoḥ atimuktiḥ ati ha

original: vai punarmṛtyum mucyate ya evametāmagnihotre mṛtyoratimuktiṃ veda 2.3.3.[10]
analyzed: vai punarmṛtyum mucyate yaḥ evam etām agnihotre mṛtyoḥ atimuktim veda
yathā vai iṣoḥ anīkam

original: evaṃ yajñānāmagnihotraṃ yena vā iṣoranīkameti sarvā vai
analyzed: evam yajñānām agnihotram yena vai iṣoḥ anīkam eti sarvā vai

original: teneṣuretyeteno hāsya sarve yajñakratava etam mṛtyumatimuktāḥ 2.3.3.[11]
analyzed: tena iṣuḥ eti etena u ha asya sarve yajñakratavaḥ etam mṛtyum atimuktāḥ
ahar rātre ha vai amuṣmin loke pariplavamāne
puruṣasya sukṛtam kṣiṇutaḥ rvācīnam

original: vā ato 'horātre tatho hāsyāhorātre sukṛtaṃ na kṣiṇutaḥ 2.3.3.[12]
analyzed: vai atas ha rātre tathā u ha asya ahar rātre sukṛtam na kṣiṇutaḥ
sa yathā rathopasthe tiṣṭhan
upariṣṭāt ratha cakre palyaṅyamāne upāvekṣeta evam

original: parastādarvācīno 'horātre upāvekṣate naha vā asyāhorātre sukṛtaṃ kṣiṇuto ya
analyzed: parastāt arvācīnaḥ ha rātre upāvekṣate na ha vai asya ahar rātre sukṛtam kṣiṇutaḥ yaḥ
evam etām ahar rātrayoḥ atimuktim veda
pūrveṇa āhavanīyam parītya

original: antareṇa gārhapatyaṃ caiti na vai devā manuṣyaṃ
analyzed: antareṇa gārhapatyam ca eti na vai devāḥ manuṣyam

original: vidusta enametadantareṇātiyantaṃ vidurayaṃ vai na idaṃ juhotītyagnirvai pāpmano
analyzed: viduḥ te enam etat antareṇa atiyantam viduḥ ayam vai naḥ idam juhoti iti agniḥ vai pāpmanaḥ
pahantā tau asya āhavanīyaḥ ca gārhapatyaḥ ca antareṇa atiyataḥ pāpmānam apahataḥ saḥ
pahata pāpmā jyotiḥ eva śriyā yaśasā bhavati
uttaratas vai agnihotrasya dvāram

original: sa yathā dvārā prapadyetaivaṃ tadatha yo
analyzed: sa yathā dvārā prapadyeta evam tat atha yaḥ

original: dakṣiṇata etyāste yathā bahirdhā caredevaṃ tat 2.3.3.[15]
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas etya āste yathā bahirdhā caret evam tat
nauḥ ha vai eṣā svargyā

original: yadagnihotraṃ tasyā etasyai nāvaḥ svargyāyā āhavanīyaścaiva
analyzed: yat agnihotram tasyai etasyai nāvaḥ svargyāyai āhavanīyaḥ ca eva

original: gārhapatyaśca naumaṇḍe athaiṣa eva nāvājo yatkṣīrahotā 2.3.3.[16]
analyzed: gārhapatyaḥ ca nau maṇḍe atha eṣaḥ eva nāvā ajaḥ yat kṣīra hotā
sa yat prāṅ upodaiti

original: tadenām prācīmabhyajati svargaṃ lokamabhi tayā svargaṃ lokaṃ
analyzed: tat enām prācīm abhyajati svargam lokam abhi tayā svargam lokam

original: samaṣnute tasyā uttarata ārohaṇaṃ sainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ samāpayatyatha yo
analyzed: samaṣnute tasyāḥ uttaratas ārohaṇam sā enam svargam lokam samāpayati atha yaḥ

original: dakṣiṇata etyāste yathā pratīrṇāyāmāgacetsa vihīyeta sa tata eva bahirdhā syādevaṃ
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas etya āste yathā pratīrṇāyām āgacet sa vihīyeta sa tatas eva bahirdhā syāt evam
tat

original: atha yāmetāṃ samidhamabhyādadhāti seṣṭakā yena mantreṇa juhoti
analyzed: atha yām etām samidham abhyādadhāti sā iṣṭakā yena mantreṇa juhoti
tat yajuḥ yena etām iṣṭakām upadadhāti yadā vai iṣṭakā upadhīyate tha āhutiḥ hūyate

original: tadasyopahitāsveveṣṭakāsvetā āhutayo hūyante yā etā agnihotrāhutayaḥ 2.3.3.[18]
analyzed: tat asya upahitāsu eva iṣṭakāsu etāḥ āhutayaḥ hūyante yāḥ etāḥ agnihotra āhutayaḥ
prajāpatiḥ vai agniḥ

original: saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatiḥ saṃvatsare-saṃvatsare ha vā
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ vai prajāpatiḥ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare ha vā

original: asyāgnihotraṃ cityenāgninā saṃtiṣṭhate saṃvatsare-saṃvatsare cityamagnimāpnoti ya
analyzed: asya agnihotram cityena agninā saṃtiṣṭhate saṃvatsare saṃvatsare cityam agnim āpnoti yaḥ

original: evaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhotyetadu hāsyāgnihotraṃ cityenāgninā saṃtiṣṭhate
analyzed: evam vidvān agnihotram juhoti etat u ha asya agnihotram cityena agninā saṃtiṣṭhate
cityam agnim āpnoti
sapta ca vai śatāni aśītīnām ṛcaḥ

original: viṃśatiśca sa yatsāyam prātaragnihotraṃ juhoti te
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ ca sa yat sāyam prātar agnihotram juhoti te

original: dve āhutī tā asya saṃvatsara āhutayaḥ sampadyante 2.3.3.[20]
analyzed: dve āhutī tāḥ asya saṃvatsara āhutayaḥ sampadyante
sapta ca eva śatāni viṃśatiḥ ca
saṃvatsare saṃvatsare ha vai asya agnihotram

original: mahatokthena sampadyate saṃvatsare saṃvatsare mahadukthamāpnoti ya evaṃ
analyzed: mahatā ukthena sampadyate saṃvatsare saṃvatsare mahat uktham āpnoti yaḥ evam
vidvān agnihotram juhoti etat u ha asya agnihotram mahatā ukthena sampadyate
mahat uktham āpnoti
agnau ha vai devāḥ

original: sarvānpaśūnnidadhire ye ca grāmyā ye cāraṇyā vijayaṃ
analyzed: sarvān paśūn nidadhire ye ca grāmyāḥ ye ca āraṇyāḥ vijayam

original: vopapraiṣyantaḥ kāmacārasya vā kāmāyāyaṃ no gopiṣṭho gopāyaditi vā 2.3.4.[2]
analyzed: vā upapraiṣyantaḥ kāmacārasya vā kāmāya ayam naḥ gopiṣṭhaḥ gopāyat iti vā
tān u ha agniḥ nicakame

original: taiḥ samgṛhya rātrim praviveśa punarema iti devā edagniṃ
analyzed: taiḥ samgṛhya rātrim praviveśa punar emaḥ iti devāḥ ā id agnim

original: tirobhūtaṃ te ha vidāṃ cakruriha vai prāvikṣadrātriṃ vai prāvikṣaditi
analyzed: tirobhūtam te ha vidām cakruḥ iha vai prāvikṣat rātrim vai prāvikṣat iti

original: tametatpratyāyatyāṃ rātrau sāyamupātiṣṭhanta dehi naḥ paśūnpunarnaḥ paśūndehīti
analyzed: tam etat pratyāyatyām rātrau sāyam upātiṣṭhanta dehi naḥ paśūn punar naḥ paśūn dehi iti
tebhyaḥ gniḥ paśūn punar adadāt
tasmai kam agnī upatiṣṭheta
agnī vai dātārau tau eva etat yācate sāyam upatiṣṭheta

original: sāyaṃ hi devā upātiṣṭhanta datto haivāsmā etau paṣūnya evaṃ vidvānupatiṣṭhate 2.3.4.[4]
analyzed: sāyam hi devāḥ upātiṣṭhanta dattaḥ ha eva asmai etau paṣūn yaḥ evam vidvān upatiṣṭhate
atha yasmāt na upatiṣṭheta

original: ubhaye ha vā idamagre sahāsurdevāśca manuṣyāśca
analyzed: ubhaye ha vai idam agre saha āsuḥ devāḥ ca manuṣyāḥ ca

original: tadyaddha sma manuṣyāṇāṃ na bhavati taddha sma devānyācanta idaṃ vai no
analyzed: tat yat ha sma manuṣyāṇām na bhavati tat ha sma devān yācante idam vai naḥ

original: nāstīdaṃ no 'stviti te tasyā eva yāñcyāyai dveṣeṇa devāstirobhūtā neddhinasāni
analyzed: na asti idam naḥ stu iti te tasyai eva yāñcyāyai dveṣeṇa devāḥ tirobhūtāḥ na id hinasāni
na id dveṣya u sāni iti tasmāt na upatiṣṭheta
atha yasmāt upa eva tiṣṭheta

original: yajño vai devānāmāśīryajamānasya tadvā eṣa eva yajño
analyzed: yajñaḥ vai devānām āśīḥ yajamānasya tat vai eṣaḥ eva yajñaḥ
yat āhutiḥ āśīḥ eva yajamānasya tat yat eva asya atra tat eva etat upatiṣṭhamānaḥ kurute
tasmāt upa eva tiṣṭheta
atha yasmāt na upatiṣṭheta

original: yo vai brāhmaṇaṃ vā śaṃsamāno 'nucarati kṣatriyaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ vai brāhmaṇam vā śaṃsamānaḥ nucarati kṣatriyam

ca eva enam etat trayyā ca vidyayā parigṛhṇāti
atha yat sākamedhaiḥ yajate
indreṇa eva etat rājñā indreṇa anīkena aparān caturaḥ māsaḥ

original: prajayati tattryenī śalalī bhavati lohaḥ kṣurastena parivartayate tadbrahmaṇā
analyzed: prajayati tat tryenī śalalī bhavati lohaḥ kṣuraḥ tena parivartayate tat brahmaṇā
ca eva enam etat trayyā ca vidyayā parigṛhṇāti
sa yat vaiśvadevena yajate
agniḥ eva tarhi bhavati agneḥ eva sāyujyam salokatām

original: jayatyatha yatsākamedhairyajata indra eva tarhi bhavatīndrasyaiva sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ
analyzed: jayati atha yat sākamedhaiḥ yajate indraḥ eva tarhi bhavati indrasya eva sāyujyam salokatām
jayati
sa yasmin hartau amum lokam eti

original: sa enamṛtuḥ parasmā ṛtave prayacati para u parasmā
analyzed: saḥ enam ṛtuḥ parasmai ṛtave prayacati paras u parasmai

original: ṛtave prayacati sa paramameva sthānam paramāṃ gatiṃ gacati cāturmāsyayājī
analyzed: ṛtave prayacati sa paramam eva sthānam paramām gatim gacati cāturmāsya yājī

original: tadāhurna cāturmāsyayājinamanuvindanti paramaṃ hyeva khalu sa sthānam
analyzed: tat āhuḥ na cāturmāsya yājinam anuvindanti paramam hi eva khalu sa sthānam
paramāṃgatim gacati iti
